SMW Subobject for ClosedExamine: A sack for storing grimy herbs.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Herb sackUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Herb sack.pngWeight: 1.000Value: 1Version anchor: ClosedRelease date: 13 August 2015Item ID: 13226

A herb sack is an item that can be bought from Slayer masters for 750 Slayer reward points or from Farmer Gricoller's Rewards for 250 Tithe Farm points.

Buying one requires level 58 in Herblore (cannot be boosted) and allows the player to store up to 30 of each of the grimy standard herbs, for a total of 420 stored. Players can right-click to open the sack, which will have grimy herbs that the player picks up, as well as those harvested from a herb patch and Herbiboars be automatically placed inside the sack, providing there is space for it. A full herb sack is worth 1,237,440.

Players cannot store cleaned herbs in the herb sack. Attempting to do so will result in the message You can't possibly put that in there, it would spoil your sack.

The herb sack can be checked to find out how many different herbs it contains. By clicking it all herbs in inventory will be deposited in the herb sack unless it is full.

The player can use the 'Empty' feature while inside a bank, emptying its contents directly to the players bank.

The herb sack is useful for killing monsters that often drop valuable herbs, such as flesh crawlers, aberrant spectres, and deviant spectres, since it only takes up one inventory slot.

Herbs stored in the sack are not lost upon death. They will be dropped on the ground instead. It's advisable to pick up the herb sack and open it first, that way your herbs will be deposited in there directly.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 June 2020
(update)

On death, grimy herbs within the herb sack are no longer deleted. Instead, the herbs either go to the player's Grave or to a PKer’s loot pile

16 April 2020
(update | poll)

Players can now purchase the herb sack from Farmer Gricoller's Rewards for 250 points.

23 January 2020
(update | poll)
  • Open and closed versions have been added, which allows herbs that the player obtains be automatically placed inside the sack while opened, providing there is space for it.
  • "Open" was added as a right-click option.
22 February 2018
(update | poll)

Emptying the contents of the herb sack into the inventory can now be done by holding down shift and left-clicking it if shift-click dropping is enabled.

20 August 2015
(update)
  • It is now possible to use a herb on the herb sack (or vice versa) to place that herb into the sack.
  • Some game messages relating to adding and removing herbs from a herb sack can now be filtered.
v • d • e

A '''herb sack''' is an item that can be bought from [[Slayer master]]s for 750 [[Slayer reward point]]s or from [[Farmer Gricoller's Rewards]] for 250 [[Tithe Farm]] points.

Buying one requires level 58 in [[Herblore]] ('''cannot''' be boosted) and allows the player to store up to 30 of each of the grimy standard [[Herb#Herb table|herbs]], for a total of 420 stored. Players can right-click to open the sack, which will have grimy herbs that the player picks up, as well as those harvested from a herb patch and [[Herbiboar]]s be automatically placed inside the sack, providing there is space for it. A full herb sack is worth {{Coins|30*({{GEP|Grimy guam leaf}} + {{GEP|Grimy marrentill}} + {{GEP|Grimy tarromin}} + {{GEP|Grimy harralander}} + {{GEP|Grimy ranarr weed}} + {{GEP|Grimy toadflax}} + {{GEP|Grimy irit leaf}} + {{GEP|Grimy avantoe}} + {{GEP|Grimy kwuarm}} + {{GEP|Grimy snapdragon}} + {{GEP|Grimy cadantine}} + {{GEP|Grimy lantadyme}} + {{GEP|Grimy dwarf weed}} + {{GEP|Grimy torstol}}) }}.

Players cannot store cleaned herbs in the herb sack. Attempting to do so will result in the message ''You can't possibly put that in there, it would spoil your sack.''

The herb sack can be checked to find out how many different herbs it contains. By clicking it all herbs in inventory will be deposited in the herb sack unless it is full.

The player can use the 'Empty' feature while inside a bank, emptying its contents directly to the players bank.

The herb sack is useful for killing monsters that often drop valuable herbs, such as [[flesh crawler]]s, [[aberrant spectre]]s, and [[deviant spectre]]s, since it only takes up one inventory slot.

Herbs stored in the sack are not lost upon death. They will be dropped on the ground instead. It's advisable to pick up the herb sack and open it first, that way your herbs will be deposited in there directly.
